ht.description: Radio Timoun 90.9 FM Stereo is a broadcast radio station from Port-au-Prince, Haiti providing News, Culture, Education, Information and Religious and instrumental music.

ht.name: Radio Evangelique Voix de Dieu
ht.description: We are pleased that you visit our broadcasting webpage today. Radio Evangelique La Voix de Dieu is a Christ-Centered, biblically grounded ministry. Our commitment to Jesus impels us to take action by spreading the gospel worldwide and engaging every christian to master an abundant life in Jesus Christ.

ht.name: La Voix de l'Esperance
ht.description: Radio Voix de l’Espérance Exactement 9 ans, ou 108 mois, ou 3294 jours, ou 79,056 heures depuis que votre serviteur a été installé à la Direction de la Radio Voix de l’Espérance, celle qui montre à tous : hommes et femmes, jeunes et vieux, grands et petits, instruits ou ignorants, la Voie de l’Espérance. Que de grâces le Seigneur n’a-t-il déversées sur notre Administration ! Que de miracles le Seigneur n’a-t-il accomplis en faveur de la Radio pendant notre ministère ! Que d’amour  n’a-t-il répandu sur notre personnel ! Que de tendresse  et d’affection n’avons-nous jouis de la part de nos auditeurs ! Que de générosité, certains frères et Sœurs n’ont-ils manifestée à l’endroit de l’Eglise dans les airs pendant notre gestion ! …

ht.description: Radio Télé Shalom launched on February 23, 2012 is a Gospel (mainly) FM station based in Haiti. Christian Education, Religious talk, news and informational programs include in the content broadcasted by Port-au-Prince based Radio . Listen to the live adoration and Love your Lord. The Gospel station is available across the world via its online facility. Tabernacle de gloire is the slogan of the FM.

ht.name: Radio Soleil

ht.name: Caraibes FM
ht.description: Radio Television Caraibes broadcasts live from Port-au-Prince, Haiti. It was created in 1949 by the Brown family. It is currently run by Patrick Moussignac. Caraibes FM hosts the most popular talk show on the island called Ranmasse. It has been rebroadcast to the Haitian diaspora from a handful of radio station from Miami to Montreal and Paris. Listen to Radio Caraibes from the U.S. by calling 712.432.6595.

ht.name: Radio Mega Haiti
ht.description: Radio Mega Haiti 1700 AM Florida and 103.7 FM Port-au-Prince and Cap-Haïtien is one of the largest Haitian radio stations representing south. The broadcasting company form US is overseeing the management of Radio form US for more than a decade now. The transmission of the Mega reaches over 750,000 Haitians in South Florida which make the second largest community in the state. Jean Alex Saint Surin is the CEO (PDG) of the station. The content mainly consists of French and Creole and small contributions of English. The Caribbean music overpowers the listeners with Kompa, Zouk, Salsa, Compass etc and others. Apart from music Radio Mega broadcasts News, Sports programs, cultural programs, Sports and internationale stories.

ht.description: Welcome to Radio Voix Ave Maria. Our mission is to guide people of all backgrounds into a personal relationship with Jesus Christ.

Un espace de promotion de la musique évangélique haïtienne. Un espace virtuel de rencontre entre les artistes évangéliques et le public.Une radio qui vous apporte des services d’adorations chez vous !Un portail des activités évangéliques en Haïti. Une nouvelle source d’inspiration évangélique.La dernière-née des radios évangéliques en Haïti.

ht.description: Radio Port-au-Prince Plus is a Haitian radio station based in New York. The channel broadcasts religious, news, general information, Bible Studies, Musiques Evangeliques, Gospel music, Sermons and much more in Creole and English for its listeners form Haiti and United States.

ht.name: Radio Saint Marc
ht.description: Radio Saint Marc 104.9 FM is one of the oldest stations based in the western commune of Haiti in the Artibonite department. The programs transmitted by the Radio Saint consist of News, regional stories, Gospel, and music in Creole and French.

ht.description: RADIO FIDELEFM is a means everyone can hear radio station that is comfortable in several categories such as news, music, talk.

ht.description: Listen to us on 92.9 FM (Stereo) & 1030 AM and Watch us on Channel 18 Live from Haiti!Find us Online for a Live Broadcast of our Radio Station and Video Updates of the latest in News and Cultural Events from our Television Station.

ht.name: Radio Lumière
ht.description: Radio Lumière belongs to the Evangelical Baptist Mission of South Haiti but is operated as a service to all of the evangelical churches. In fact, Radio Lumière is known as the voice of the Protestant Church in Haiti. Programming, staff, and financial support come from all of the evangelical denominations.

ht.name: Radio Metropole Haiti
ht.description: Radio Métropole Haiti is a broadcast radio station in Port-au-Prince, Haiti, providing news bulletins, newsletters, variety shows, national music and international emissions political, economic, social and cultural.

ht.name: Sky fm
ht.description: Haiti Sky FM is a online music radio station. Haiti Sky FM broadcasts to the regions 24 hours a day, 12 months of the year. With a great mix of pop music. Haiti Sky FM has something for all discerning music lovers.

ht.name: Radio Flamax
ht.description: Radio Flamax 99.9 FM Stereo brings to its listeners the daily news (Actualités), Cultural programs, Health (Santé) related content and latest happenings form the commune of Miragoâne, Nippes Department, Haiti and other parts of Caribbean and world. Récents, Archives, Podcast Emissions and much more is available online on the web-facility of Radio Flamax.

ht.name: Radio Miracle Port au Prince Haiti
ht.description: MIRACLE FM HAITI fm. We are located in new york. We are committed to play Christian music, serve and entertain the Haitian community by propagating the Good news of Jesus Christ

ht.name: Chokarella Radio
ht.description: Chokarella, broadcasted on Radio One (Haiti) and all around the world on chokarella.com, it is the number one morning show in Haiti. The radio show reaches 70% of the national territory, allowing Carel to be heard in homes and cars across the nation from 6am to 10am. Every day, thousands of listeners across the globe tune in to listen to Carel provide them with useful advice, the latest tunes, and chat about current events. As such, Chokarella is widely recognized as a resource for many Haitians, Haitian-Americans, and foreign audiences living abroad.

ht.name: Radio Galaxie
ht.description: Radio Tele Galaxie is a broadcast radio station in Port-au-Prince, Haiti, providing Caribbean music.

ht.name: BSM Radio Haiti
ht.description: BOBBY SOUND MINISTRIES is founded in 2001 by the Rev. Robert AUGUSTE Our headquarters is located in Fort Lauderdale, Florida headed by a Central Board of directors with our office in Haiti. We're certified 501(C)3 IRS Charity.

ht.name: La Brise FM
ht.description: Radio Télé La Brise ou RTLB est un service de radiodiffusion et télévision commercial qui émet depuis Camp-Perrin en Haïti. Cette station qui au départ assurait uniquement une couverture dans la région de Camp-Perrin s'est étendue à toute la Métropole Sud. Radio Télé La Brise s'implique dans la promotion du Sud d'Haïti par des émissions locales permettant de découvrir les artisans, entrepreneurs et politiciens de la région. Les émissions sont diffusées à la télévision et à la radio. Elle diffuse également diverses productions provenant d'autres stations de radio et de télévisions tant au niveau national qu'international. Mis à part les différents tests effectués pour évaluer l'intérêt de la population pour la station, La Brise FM a commencé à émettre sur le 104.9 de façon officielle en décembre 2007.

ht.name: Radio Super Gemini
ht.description: Le Shining Star!Nous vous souhaitons la bienvenue sur le site de Radio Super Gemini.Ca fait deja plus de 20 ans que nous avons commencé ce projet de radiodiffusion à Saint-Marc.Apres toutes ces années de formation et de service à la population St-Marcoise,nous avons décidé d'étendre notre présence un peu plus loin et permettreaux auditeurs éparpillés à travers le monde de nous écouter comme au bon vieux temps.

ht.name: Radio CEMES Haiti
ht.description: Prêcher la bonne nouvelle de l'évangile partout sur la planète. Ramener des brebis égarées et conduire les perdus aux pâturages du royaume de Jésus. Cemeshaiti fait la promotion des activités des églises. publier les prédications vidéos et audios, musiques, videos et vos promouvoir les artiste évangéliques.

ht.name: Sweet Gospel FM
ht.description: Sweet Gospel FM 104.5 is a christian radio station based in Port-au-Prince, Haiti. The station is here to serve the humanity by promoting the Gospel music, broadcasting sermons, religious talks and all that leads you to path of righteousness and glory. May! Lord by with You. The station is available online on AudioNow.

ht.name: Radio Ideal FM Haiti
ht.description: Radio Ideal FM Haiti is a broadcast radio station in Port-De-Paix, Haiti, providing News, Information, Sports, Gospel and Variety of music.

ht.name: Radio Balade FM
ht.description: Radio Balade FM 102.3 Stereo, launched on June 15, 2000, is a radio station based in Port-de-Paix. The Radio owned by Arne communications Network is aimed to provide those living in northwest and overseas the economic and social development coverage. Lou Evans ARNE is the director of the station broadcasting from Rebecca Street, Port de Paix, a town is the Northwest of Haiti. The FM will soon be available in broadcasting in Department of Artibonite on the dedicated frequency. Radio 102.3 FM promotes socio-cultural development, brotherhood, civil liberties, cultural and communal peace and harmony among the northwest in particular and Haitians in general. The bridge between North westerner overseas, Haiti and World is successfully educating, informing and entertaining the Northwest of Haiti. Be it the local Radio FM listeners or internet users everyone is getting their fair share of the political, social, economic and cultural insights prioritize by Radio 102.3 stereo FM. The Radio is preserving the history, music and culture of the region and sponsoring the rural life and healthy debates and discussions in the Diaspora.

ht.name: Zones FM
ht.description: Zones FM is all about the world evolution. Zones FM is a christian radio station. We specialize mainly in breaking news and politics

ht.name: Radio Alleluia FM
ht.description: Emitting radio on FM 92.1 , but also available online on the radio www.radioalleluiafm.com - An area of ​​propagation of the Gospel of Jesus Christ through the gospel music and the many messages of modules. - A promotional space of Haitian evangelical music. - A virtual meeting place between artists and the public evangelical . - A radio that brings you to worship services at home! - A portal evangelical activities in Haiti . - A new source of evangelical inspiration . - The newest evangelical radio stations in Haiti.

ht.name: Radio Négritude
ht.description: Radio Négritude 89.7 FM Stéréo Jacmel is News and current affairs radio station that broadcasts 24×7 form Haiti. The content propagated by the station includes Actualité, Politique, Justice, Économie, Culture & Société, Santé, Sport and Tourisme. Haitian values, regional happenings, local and international music i.e. Compass, Kompa, Salsa, Zouk, Dance, Hip Hop, Rock, Electronic and others also make regular part of the transmissions. You can listen to the FM online on the official webpage of the station. AudioNow@ 712 432 7831 gives the opportunity to the listeners form USA to have the channel on the Mobile devices. You can follow the Négritude on Facebook, Twitter and Youtube.

ht.name: Radio Haiti Fusion
ht.description: Radio Haiti Fusion from Port-au-Prince is a right place for those interested in listening to the best Zouk, Konpa, Compas, Salsa and other Caribbean genres. Apart from of variety of music charts including Dance, Latino Pop, Jazz, Rock and others, audiences can interact with the national culture, society and get quickly informed of the regional happenings. The best Fusion of online music is available on the official website.

ht.name: Radio Tele Boston
ht.description: Radio Tele Boston is an online radio station from Haiti, providing Spoken programms and music

ht.name: Radio Canarie
ht.description: Radio Canarie 98.3 FM Ouanaminthe is a radio station that welcomes you live from Ouanaminthe. Audiences can listen to Live news, sports updates, music and cultural programs and much more through the official FM stream in high quality.

ht.name: Radio Couleur
ht.description: Radio couleur FM a été fondé le 2 Aout 2010 par Ronel Bien aimeDepuis 2010, Radio couleur FM est une entreprise privée et indépendante de radio diffusion La programmation de radio couleur FM est composée d’émissions de variété, de musiques nationale et internationale, d’émissions à caractère politique, économique, sociale et culturelle. Ses émissions sont retransmises 24/7 sur la fréquence 94.1 FM en stéréo a Nord-ouest d’Haïti et sur le site internet de radio Couleur fm

ht.name: Radio Magik9
ht.description: Radio Magik9 100.9 MHz FM is a Haitian Radio station from Port au Prince broadcasting latest hits as well as classic Haitian music in the Hispaniola, Antilles and Caribbean regions. The music lovers can find a whole diverse range of local, regional and International French music. Lively chats and rejoicing talks bring a good dose of fun, humor and enjoyment for followers.

ht.name: Radio Télé Parisienne
ht.description: Radio Télé Parisienne 94.7 FM Saint-Marc aims to inform, educate and entertain the masses of Haiti while promoting the democratic debate both nationally and internationally obviously with responsibility. The channel offers a wide choice of quality cultural programs as well as covering the major events across the world. RTP 94.7 FM plays a vital role in the dissemination of knowledge and development of social integration and ties between the Haitians in the country and expatriates out of Haiti. Le Monde en Action (The World in Action) is the slogan of the Radio Télé Parisienne. The mission of the activities and actions of the Parisienne is to contribute to the cultural and economic development in the country.

ht.name: Radio 7
ht.description: La web, así como sus contenidos, pertenecen a la empresa o a terceras personas, por lo que ningún usuario está autorizado a hacer uso de ellos, ni imprimirlos ni almacenarlos bajo ningún soporte físico, a no ser que sea para utilización personal y privada. Quedando prohibida la modificación, descompilación o la utilización parcial o completa de cualquier parte de la misma en cualquiera de los soportes en los que se ofrezca. Tan sólo se autoriza la utilización de los contenidos de la web con fines informativos y de servicio, siempre que se cite o se haga referencia a la fuente, siendo el usuario el único responsable del mal uso de los mismos.

ht.name: Fusion FM
ht.description: FusionFM is an internet radio station from Haiti providing Tropical music.

ht.name: Radio Tele Macaya
ht.description: Radio Tele Macaya 102.5 FM Les Cayes launched on October 19, 1996 is an act of faith, witness of an attachment to the Sud (south), both traditional and revolutionary; the expression of a belief that the cays and the region can regain its lost days. Raymond Clerge is the director general of the Macaya. At some point, around the country emerged some good caliber radio stations, the South had to give the reply and to rein in. Le pont entre le Sud d’Haiti et le reste du Monde is the slogan of the Macaya 102.5 FM aux Cayes.From the beginning, Macaya Radio is positioned as a national channel. The technological design ranks among the most powerful and best performing in the Radio market. Macaya 102.5 FM aux Cayes brings to the population of the peninsula of south pieces, of News, information, entertainment and recreation it needs to better thrive. Culture, Sports and music, French Talk are the basic components of the content.

ht.name: Scoop FM
ht.description: Scoop FM 107.7 is a broadcast based radio station from Port-au-Prince that plays World genre of music. .

ht.name: Radio Fenique Inter
ht.description: Radio Fenique Inter 101.1 Fm is a broadcast radio station from Cap-Haïtien, Haiti providing News, Informaion, Talk and Music.

ht.name: Sans Souci FM
ht.description: Sans Souci FM 106.9 Cap-Haitien was conceived in 1991 under the name Radio Konbit as part of a process to national integration through decentralization. The project aimed to break the isolation of provinces facing the centralization of all decisions, activities and even information from the capital. The province should have its own voice. The implementation process was interrupted in September 1991 and resumed in January 1998 under the name of Sans Souci FM. The name and strategy have changed following the tragic assassination in August 1994 of one of the project sponsors. L’évasion totale is the slogan of the Cap-Haitien based station.

ht.name: Univers FM
ht.description: Univers fm is a broadcast radio station from Port-au-Prince, Port-au-Price, Haiti providing Talk, Entertainment and music.

ht.name: Radio Horizon 2000
ht.description: Radio Horizon 2000 FM 95.7 is a broadcast radio station from Bourdon, Haiti, providing Haitian Classic Soft music including Traditional, Racine, Acoustic, Oldies, Rap, Instrumental and gospel, Hip Hop, and Zouk.

ht.name: Bon Déjeuner! Radio
ht.description: Bon Déjeuner! Radio is an online streaming radio station that broadcasts Top music, live concerts, interviews, shows, and news across the internet. The station is based in Haiti and it has reached more than seven million streams plays worldwide. The station has collected Top music from different genres and stream them to the right audiences in order to connect all music lovers and listeners together.

ht.name: Radio Tele Delta Stereo
ht.description: La Chaîne Techno et des évenements en direct | Toute l'actualité du numérique et des infos de première main.

ht.name: Radio SuperStar
ht.description: Radio SuperStar a vu le jour le 10 Mai 1987. A partir de la concrétisation des nouvelles idées radiophoniques de son dynamique propriétaire Albert Chancy Jr., ces émissions ont su très tôt révolutionner le monde de la radio-diffusion en Haïti.25 ans après, Radio SuperStar reste et demeure  une des stations de radio les plus ecoutées en Haiti.

ht.name: Radio Tropicale
ht.description: Radio Tropicale 1480 AM broadcasting from Port-au-Prince has some fine stock of local, regional and international music. Listeners can also find sports updates, news stories, talk shows and much more on the Radio. Enjoy the best of tropical music! Radio Tropicale is available on all popular streaming platforms like tunein, streema and of course your favorite website you are surfing now.

ht.name: Radio Jouvence
ht.description: Radio Jouvence 103.9 FM launched on July 7, 2008 is a Haitian station based in Cap-Haïtien. The official website of Radio Jouvence aims to position itself as the meeting point of a great online community. This meeting point of youth can be of great use as a constructive platform for many underprivileged and those with a very little chance to engage in healthy tasks. The rise in social media and improving the quality of their content proves unequivocally that the survival of any communication medium depends largely on the constant search for this balance with its audience. You can follow the Jouvence 103.9 FM on Facebook and Twitter. The FM 103.9 with the slogan of 50 ans d’avance has a strong presence of 50 years in the Cap-Haïtien and strong roots across Haiti and Caribbean. The best Adult-contemporary music, Hip Hop, Pop, Caribbean, regional music, cultural, educational and grooming programs for youth are the key content of the station. There are forums you can give your opinion in and do other activities on the official website: RadioJouvence.com

ht.name: Harmony Fm
ht.description: Radio Harmony Fm 96.5 is usually an global on-line radio section actively playing a new, uplifting as well as eclectic new music format for a world wide crowd. Radio Harmony Fm 96.5 usually are a completely independent section with the on-line generation, connecting people that have a powerful reference to Jacmel, Haiti.

ht.name: Radio Cacique
ht.description: Radio Cacique, a eu la première femme opératrice de radio en Haïti.Nous avons toujours fait de la défense de la liberté d’expression notre cheval de bataille. En 1964, nous avons assiste au départ pour l’exil de deux de nos membres fondateurs: Roger San Millan et Anthony Phelps. Entre 1963 et 1969, les studios ont été transportes a l’étage de la maison d’Adesky a la rue Traversière. Durant cette période, Gérard Camfort, Eddy Zamor, Wilson M. Pierrelus, Jacques Sampeur, Rockefeller Jean- Baptiste ont intègre le staff. Certains se souviendront encore des émissions exclusivement dédiées a l’orchestre de Nemours Jean-Baptiste « cacique publicités » et « battant pavillon rouge et blanc » sans oublier les émissions de musiques haïtiennes animées par Jacques Sampeur et plus particulièrement, celles du samedi réservées au Tabou Combo. L’auditorium (radio théâtre) de Radio Cacique, a également vu défiler nombre d’artistes et d’ orchestres tels, ceux de Nemours Jean-Baptiste et de Webert Sicot, des mini jazz comme les Ambassadeurs, les Diplomates, les Vickings dont Jean-Claude Carrie ex- directeur de Radio Cacique et musicien consomme en était le parrain. De 1969 a1972, Radio Cacique vit ses studios transportes a la place Jérémie (bas peu de chose), au restaurant dansant « l’Oasis » (a cote du ciné Eldorado), propriété du bien connu, journaliste, ex dirigeant du groupe carnavalesque « LOBODIA », ex-maire de Port-au-Prince : André Juste qui, lui aussi, a pendant de nombreuses années fait partie de notre staff.

ht.name: Radio Tele Perfection
ht.description: Radio Tele Perfection 89.5 FM Port-de-Paix is an adult contemporary station catering the needs of Haitian youth with new style and trends. The mythologicial characters, local inhabitants have their own way to conduct the programs and tell the stories. Audiences will be obliged to find the Perfection online and can feel free to leave what they think should be there; the staff would be more than happy to respond you. The Live 24×7 broadcasts consist of Haitian Talk, local content, cultural show and non-stop musique.

ht.name: Radio Tele Fhaeh
ht.description: Radio Tele Fhaeh 107.5 FM Saut-d’Eau is a FM station based in Haiti. The Mix-format channel broadcasts a wide range of content ranging from information to entertainment from the commune of Saut-d’Eau. Listeners of the 107.5 FM can listen to the News, informational content, cultural programs, daily Sports stories, non-stop Haitian and Caribbean music and lot more. Peterson Jeanty is the Director General and Rose Andre Seide is the PDG (CEO) of the Fhaeh . Aider, Former et informer la Communaute (Help, Train and Inform the community) is the mission of the Radio Tele Fhaeh 107.5 FM. The website of the Fhaeh 107.5 FM is a one place for all the transmissions and engaging posts for Haitians which are updated on daily bases. Visitors can read Actualites, Sports stuff, cultural posts, Carnavals, festivals, archives, podcasts and everything with a link to Haiti with significant meaning is there for the listeners and readers. You can read the articles, popular ones from the best writers across Haiti. Radio Tele Fhaeh is available on AudioNow for the listeners to receive the streams on their mobiles by calling on 712 832 2752. The fans can always find Radio Tele Fhaeh 107.5 FM to make a social connection.

ht.name: Radio Pure FM
ht.description: Radio Pure FM is an online radio station providing music, news, talk shows and concerts with an emphasis on Haitian culture. Our listeners can listen to a variety of music including but not limited to Kompa, Zouk, Racine, R&B, Soul, Hip-Hop. We also cover news in Haiti, the Haitian Diaspora, and around the world. We also offer shows on politics, cultures, finance, tax and many other relevant subjects.

ht.name: Radio Sud Internationale
ht.description: Radio Sud Internationale 103.9 FM Stereo Maurice, Haiti (RSI) is a non-profit community station that represents the voice of Haitians from south and those living outside the Haiti. The Sud (South) Radio is committed to build a bridge between the Haitians and outside of the Caribbean that strengthens every day. The excellent transmission consisting of French Talk and best music are increasing the popularity of the Stereo station that is pretty affluent in terms of the content and facilities. The entertainment brought by the channel never misses to be mixed with the healthy discussions on the social, political and economic issues of the Haitians. Listeners are all allowed to contribute to the good things taken by the channel. Listen to your favorite artists and DJs 24×7 in high quality stream.

ht.name: Radio Sam's FM
ht.description: To serve the community

ht.name: Radio Tele Cross
ht.description: Radio Tele Cross 97.3 FM is a broadcast radio station from Jacmel, Haiti, providing Culture, and Entertainment.

ht.name: Storm FM
ht.description: Storm FM 106.5 is a Haitian radio station based in Port-au-Prince. The channel’s sibling Storm TV will soon be available online. The newly launched Radio broadcasts the Caribbean and international French music online. In Addition to the rolling hour music you can also enjoy your favorite Talk programs by the presenters and Djs you wish to listen to. The JoJo show by Susan Karrol is the most popular program hosted by the station with a healthy audience and listenership in the Port-au-Prince and across Haiti. The channel 106.5 can be visited on SoundCloud and Tunein. You can also find the FM online as well as follow it on Facebook. The Audio Now (605 475 4452) can also be used for the reception of the station using your mobile devices.

ht.name: Radio Panic
ht.description: Radio Panic FM 97.5 Mirebalais  is a generalist station broadcasting news, sport, politique, technologie, art & culture and social programs in the centre department. Un choix selectif (A Selective Choice) is the slogan of the channel. Fans can visit the official webpage of the Panic to see pictures, watch videos, read variety of posts relating to the Haitians across the world and find the rest i.e. about Programmation, Staff and A Propos.

ht.name: Radio One
ht.description: Radio One 90.1 FM is a Port-au-Prince, Haiti based station which connects regularly with its listeners through amazing transmissions and variety of music charts. Listen to your favorite music genres, Griot, Marinade de Lambi, Banan Peze, Akra, folk stuff and others on your One and only Radio One Stéréo 90.1. The entertainment rich station is very popular among all the classes and age groups of the country. The satisfactory speed and quality of the One is a source of joy for the listeners using pocket FMs, web/mobile apps using mobile phones and laptops/tablets etc. The official website of the channel can be used to listen to the non-stop English and French music. Carel Pedro being one of the best host living and most popular media & TV Personality in Haiti who also has Shorty Award to his credits, took over the reins of the channel One, propagating music and information catering all areas, especially news, interviews and shows! Enjoy your favorite Playlists and pranks such as Achat Camion D’eau and Pranks Mme Doura on number One FM station as claimed by the team One. Fm One is also available on audio now.

ht.name: Radio IBO
ht.description: Radio privée généraliste, émettant depuis Delmas 49 sur le 98.5FM stéréo et aussi sur la toile http://www.radioibo.net . La passion de l'information sans passion.

ht.name: Tropic FM
ht.description: Tropic Fm émet sur la bande FM 91.3, depuis le 31 Mars 1991 sur toute la république D’haiti; Sur internet www.tropicfmhaiti.com. La pluriethnicité de la population Haitienne permet à Tropic Fm 91.3 de cohesion Politique, Sociale et Culturelle en favorisant des émissions et de la musique dans lesquelles la majorité des entités est prise en compte depuis sa creation en Haiti. La radio se veut être aussi une radio thématique à vocation éducative centrée sur la famille, la santé, l'environnement, le sport, l'agriculture et le respect de la loi haitienne et les institutions.

ht.name: Radio La Familia

ht.name: Radio Tele Orbite
ht.description: Une station de Radio, une Chaîne de Télévision et un Système mobile opérant à Jérémie depuis ans au Numéro 132 Rue Calasse sur la 100.7 FM stéréo et CH5. Pouvant atteindre les trois quart du département pendant Dix huit heures par jours ,d'une philosophie qui est de Former, d'Informer et de Promouvoir le positif sur toutes les dimensions; ce quiest illustrée par les différents programmes de la programmation quotidienne des différentes entités (Radio,Tv,et Système mobil)permettant de satisfaire à la plus grande majorité et d'acquérir la fidélité et la confiance de la population Grand'Anselaise.

ht.name: Radio Natal FM
ht.description: nous sommes  Radio Natal fm emettant depuis port de paix Haití, sur le 96.7 FM nous sommes une radio qui travail avec de l'objectivité. Le sport la musique et l'art sont au pluriels. C'est la radio natif natal haitien..

ht.name: Radyo Tipiti
ht.description: Radyo Tipiti is a web based internet radio station from Haiti, Radyo tipiti promotes music Ayitienne (and the Caribbean) and quality culture.

ht.name: Radio Tele Pyramide
ht.description: Fondée le 1er Mai 1995, TELE-RADIO PYRAMIDE FM est une station privée à but lucratif ayant pour objectif d’éduquer, de former, d’informer les Artibonitiens en particulier et tous les Haïtiens en général. TELE-RADIO PYRAMIDE FM est un organe de presse généraliste. Elle a été inaugurée par le plus célèbre journaliste haïtien Jean Léopold Dominique le jour de la fête du travail et de l’agriculture. Ce qui donne à la station une légitimité incontestable chez les paysans planteurs, les ouvriers et les travailleurs de tout type. Grâce à ses équipements futuristes et son équipe chevronnée, elle est dans un temps record devenue la plus grande de toutes les stations de nos villes de province.

ht.name: Super-Plus FM
ht.description: Plus que tout sur la band FM

ht.name: Radio Precision fm
ht.description: Radio Precision fm 101.3 stéréo, depuis Poterie route de Liancourt Artibonite, Haïti. Créer 14 février 2010, par Ing. JACKSON PREDESTIN, Président Directeur Général (PDG) 2010 à aujourd’hui, l’obje de cette dite station de Radio est de former, informer, éduquer et aider leurs jeunes à bien jerer et protéger leurs vie. Notre slogan est : “La radio de la Jeunesse !”

ht.name: Radio Optimum Haiti
ht.description: la Radio Optimum Fm est une station Radio émettant depuis  la commune Anse-Rouge, Haiti  Retrouvez toute l'actualité d'Haïti: la vie politique, les faits divers, des interviews, des émissions de divertissement et culturelles, des infos locales, du sport, de la musique haïtienne, antillaise etc...

ht.name: Radio Tele Mix
ht.description: Emettant depuis Cap-Haitien Haiti sur 102.1 FM. Cette jeune station de radio n'a rien à envier avec les autres stations de la place, elle  s'ouvre aux différents secteurs et populations de la haitienne, elle instaure une diversité de voix et d'opinions à l'antenne.

ht.name: Radio Universelle Plus 103.5 FM
ht.description: Nous sommes un ecran, un micro au service  du genre humain pour construire et non pour detruire

ht.name: Radio Xplosion
ht.description: Radio Xplosion 96.5 FM Gonaives is a mix format station that broadcasts from Haiti. The content aired by the station includes news sports and cultural programs and a variety of music including Hip Hop, Dance, Classic, Electronic, Salsa, Compas, Zouk, Kompa etc. Listeners can have the online stream, headline news, archives, podcasts and blogs.

ht.name: Radio Tropical Inter
ht.description: Une station de radio à la hauteur de la ville du cap-Haïtien qui a pour objectif œuvrer dans la formation de la jeunesse en passant par leur intégration dans le monde de la radiodiffusion.

ht.name: Radio Rythme FM d'Haiti
ht.description: Rythme FM Haiti, 95.1, le reve du Plateau avec une grande vision sur Haiti et le monde. Emettant depuis Mirebalais, Haiti

ht.name: Radio Acropole
ht.description: Radio Acropole-Haïti émet, EN DIRECT, 24/7, depuis Port-au-Prince, Haïti. Elle diffuse de la Musique du Monde (World Music), variétés tropicale et du Compas Haïtien.

ht.name: Radio MEH
ht.description: Ministere d'evangelisation en Haiti

ht.name: Radio Jupiter Plus
ht.description: Ecoutez Radio Jupiter Plus en direct sur le net depuis Liancourt Artibonite on tunein, dans tunein, tapez Radio Jupiter Plus. Si vous habitez aux Etats-Unis a partir de votre telephone, composez 641-552-5057 ou 605-477-4585 pour nous ecouter sans frais. Nous sommes sans conteste la voix de Liancourt dans le Monde.

ht.name: Radio Massacre
ht.description: Radio massacre, la radio « sans frontière» émet ses émissions depuis la ville de Ouanaminthe. Désormais grâce à cette nouvelle technologie depuis cette ville frontalière vous pouvez suivre toutes les émissions de Radio en direct ou en podcasting où que vous soyez sur la planète. La radio émet sur le 102.5 Fm pour les nordesiens.

ht.name: Radio Sensation
ht.description: Radio Sensation 89.7 FM Saint-Marc L’expression de votre désire (The expression of your wishes) is the slogan of the channel. The Non-stop Caribbean and Haitian Creole, French and English music is hosed live at the station. Audiences can enjoy the best Compas, Zouk, Konpa, Salsa, Hip Hop, Dance, Jazz and much 24×7 with the sensation of music.

ht.name: Constellation Fm - La Station de l’infinie!
ht.description: A constellation is a group of stars which make up imaginary outline or pattern in the night sky, this is why we called our Station after Constellation.

ht.name: Radio Excellence
ht.description: Excellence FM 101.5 is a broadcast radio station from Mirebalais, Haiti, providing variety of music and programs.

ht.name: Radio Mag-Horizon
ht.description: Radio Mag-Horizon (RMH) 101.9 FM Saut D’eau launched on January 19, 1996 broadcasts from the heart of Plateau-Haiti. Ernst Exilhomme is the director general of the 101.9 FM. The English and French language educational FM, broadcasts across Haiti and Caribbean with a significant listenership. The institution is at the service of masses of the Department du Centre and surrounding areas. The channel is not for any traditional media design which aims to consider the audience as a mere object to be manipulated. Radio Mag-Horizon apart from broadcasting Health, informational and entertainment based programs is a real tool for social and cultural transformation. The team works body and soul to bring the best to its audiences.

ht.name: Radio Benediction FM
ht.description: Christian Radio Station

ht.name: Radio Deca
ht.description: Ce site a pour objectif de vous présenter  Deca FM. Vous y découvrirez la présentation et l'actualité de la radio. Vous pourrez obtenir plus d'informations sur nous et nous contacter.  Deca FM  est basée en Haïti à Vieux Bourg d'Aquin et émet sur ie 104.3 FM.

ht.name: Radio Télé 6 Univers
ht.description: Radio Télé 6 Univers un service de Radio-Télédiffusion Visuelle commerciale qui émet depuis Les Cayes, Sud en Haïti. Cette station qui au départ assurait uniquement une couverture dans la région des Cayes envisage de s'etendre sur toute la Métropole Sud et ses départements limitrophes. Il s'implique dans la promotion du Sud d'Haïti par des émissions locales permettant de découvrir les artisans, entrepreneurs et politiciens de la région.qu'international. Mis à part les différents tests effectués pour évaluer l'intérêt de la population pour la station, Tele 6 Univers a commencé à émettre sur le canal 6 le 21 mars 1997 de façon officielle, des films Haitiens et etrangers, le bastion du football, des concerts video-musicaux, des Videos clips haitiennnes et etrangers et des Télé-feuilletons

ht.name: Radio Sensation
ht.description: Radio Sensation 107.9 FM Gonaïves, is a station that broadcasts from Haiti broadcasting Actualités, (news) Sports, Santé, (Health) cultural and entertainment programming with non-stop music 24×7. La Puissance d’action is the slogan of the music sensation. The official website of the station is structured for the online listeners with archive podcasts and articles for those who have interest in reading besides listening.

ht.name: Radio Oriental FM
ht.description: A Rádio Comunitária Oriental Fm, disponibiliza diversos serviços de utilidade pública. Exercemos a nossa atividade sempre com a máxima descrição e eficiência, hoje podendo ser transmitida à diversas regiões por meio do site, o que melhora ainda mais o desempenho para um ótimo atendimento à comunidade.

ht.name: Radio Tele Sigma
ht.description: Le  Sigma peut être aussi vu comme un concept complexe : C'est une Vision, une philosophie qui doit apporter aux auditeurs  la certitude de livraison du bon son. - C'est un indicateur (une mesure Standard dans le domaine de la radio diffusion).

ht.name: Kitelmache Radio
ht.description: Kitelmache Radio is an internet radio station from Haiti providing Pop and Tropical music.

ht.name: Radio Zone Inter
ht.description: Radio Zone Inter 101.1 FM Cap Rouge launched on August 23, 2012, is Haitian owned music station, a project of Zone a company launched on August 18, 2007, which has reached to over 760,000 Haitians in the country and 230,000 expatriates in South Florida, the 2nd largest of the communities. Haitian Creole and French are the languages of the FM 101.1 propagating the Caribbean rhythms such as Compas, Zouk, Konpa, Salsa and others.

ht.name: Radio Bambou Inter
ht.description: Radio Bambou Inter is a broadcast Radio station from Jacmel, Haiti, providing Caribbean, clabical and World Music Station also airs Arts, Culture, Sports and News programs.

ht.name: Radio Tele Amen
ht.description: Radio Tele Amen is a Christian radio station whose mission is to reach souls with the message that changes the life of the Gospel of Jesus Christ. Conceived thinking of you, and safely for your whole family, Radio Amen Tele brings you a solid biblical teaching, including an extraordinary list of the best speakers and teachers of the country.

ht.name: Radio Lambi
ht.description: Radio Tele Lambi, fondée à Corail dans la Grand’Anse, le 27 juin 1997, et maintenant sise au 76, rue Stenio Vincent (Basse Ville), Jérémie. Elle émet sur le 103.9 FM et le 104.1 FM Stéréo, et la Chaine 4 pour la Télévision.De son PDG, l'Honorable Sénateur Michel CLÉRIÉ, la Radio Télé Lambi arrive à avoir une couverture Départementale sure, mais elle atteint aussi les autres cotes du Territoire Haitien(ex.: L'ile de la Gonave, l'Ile de la Tortue, Petit-Goave, Fort-Liberté) et dans les hauteurs de Port-au-Prince, la capitale. Toujours avec les meilleures programmations, elle touche et entre petit à petit dans les quotidiens des Haitiens en Haiti tout comme à l'étranger.

ht.name: Radio LJS
ht.description: Radio Tele Ljs Canal 7 et 100.3 fm Stereo Depuis La rue Louverture #137 Saint-marc, Haiti. Fondee le 15 Aout 1991 Par Ulysse Louis-Jeune A pour mission d'etre La Lumiere de la jeunesse Saint-Marcoise

ht.name: Hit Fm Haiti
ht.description: La Radio de toutes les Generations

ht.name: Radio one Take
ht.description: La Radio One Take est une webradio tendance évangélique , dirigé par Directeur Homère Emerson .
